attributes.additional_details:
Because there is no evidence it will help the situation as regards to the channel crossing and immigration. 
For a government obsessed with cost, value and efficiency, the policy makes no sense.
It appears to be an incendiary policy, designed and enacted for perso-political reasons. There is no sound justification that this policy will do anything aside from distract from issues the government are currently failing to deal with or justify in an effective manner.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614913
